website_summaries.verdict: This car seat protection bag gives you options, with backpack straps, side carry straps, and a front hand carry strap.
pros: Intended for gate checking car seats
Made of tear- and water-resistant oxford nylon
Carry with two padded backpack straps, two side carry straps, and one front hand strap
Folds into its own carrying pouch
Gives flexibility for carrying different ways in different situations

customer_reviews.title: Back pack option. Easy to use and protection of car seat
customer_reviews.text: For those of you that fly, this is the coolest bag ever! We have two extra car seats when we travel. We are able to place in this bag and I am able to carry one on my back and the other in my are while walking to the check in area at the air port. There is a place to write your info down in case the seat is lost. By far the feature I like is the back pack option, and protection for your seat. For those that fly with car seats, watch how your seat is thrown around while it is being placed on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has held up well
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on a couple flights now while gate checking my son's convertible car seat. Size is roomy and I like the extra padding on the bottom. It's easy to use and has worked well as a backpack while walking through the airport. The car seat has always arrived undamaged and the bag has as well. My only suggestion is that the instructions for getting it back in the bag would be printed on it somewhere. Decided to spend more for better quality and have not been disappointed. I expect to be able to use this bag (along with the umbrella stroller bag) on many more flights.
customer_reviews.author: Jascher

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: The bag fit well around the car seat. The velcro doesn't hold well since the cinch will move it off. Once you get the seat in there it's important that you tighten the little plastic stoppers and then knot the strings together because as soon as you pick it the the stoppers DO NOTHING. On top of all this when I tried to use the backpack feature of the bag the little cheap plastic rings that hold the straps together just broke off.
customer_reviews.author: edjr04

customer_reviews.title: A convenient lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Lifesafer! Used this to carry my 5 year old daughter's booster seat on a trip we took together. The backpack style straps make it super easy to wear on your back while trying to get through the airport. It does a good job protecting the car seat from damage. When picking it up in baggage claim, you have to usually go to the oversize area instead of the conveyor belts. The design makes it easy to find among the sea of other people's items, particularly since it has a large area where you can write your name. It's pretty lightweight, so when you're done with it, it folds up and tucks away nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Alex D

customer_reviews.title: Product might not last more the 2-3 flights.
customer_reviews.text: This is an OK product. I have a Diono RX car seat which fits, but not we couldn't tie the bag all the way as the seat is bigger then others I guess?. Also, we had a flight from Long Beach to San Francisco and back. When in SF, I saw that the bag already has a whole in it. Not a sturdy material. The bag will probably be good for 2-3 flights. I like the fact that you can wear it on your back. makes it easier to carry, and that you can fold it in it's own mini bag.
customer_reviews.author: DronePro

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel, durable
customer_reviews.text: We've flown with it a half dozen times now, but always lug the car seat to the gate. Holds up fine, no tears or rips or ugliness. Just make sure you practice putting the car seat in before you're at the airport as it can be tricky setting it in how you like it, so it's easier to carry. Folding it back up is a little tricky too, but manageable. Just makes me wish I had a lighter carseat. Geez. Still no fun carrying the carseat around. At least the carseat comes out of the airport the same condition it went in.
customer_reviews.author: LLCoolJeff

customer_reviews.title: did the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. Large enough for my Diono Ranier and adjuster pad, with room to spare. Definitely made flying with a carseat easier, and the handles all over the place make it easy to pick up under any circumstance. Durable fabric, handy little zip-up pack. The shoulder straps aren't exactly comfortable, but it's good enough to get it to luggage checking (don't know if I would care to carry it all the way to gate check).
customer_reviews.author: A. Harris

customer_reviews.title: At least the car seat made it....
customer_reviews.text: The carseat fit well into this bag, it was a little snug despite it being a "slimfit" carseat. When we arrived at our destination, we were waiting in line to get our rental car and the right strap snapped when it was bumped into. On our way back through the airport on our way home, the other strap snapped without anything bumping into it. When we tried to carry it by a side handle, the handle was starting to give way as well. This bag's straps were poorly attached and it made it VERY difficult to haul the carseat around. Next time, we are getting a car seat bag that has wheels.
customer_reviews.author: David Herbstman

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for us.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this twice so far and we liked the size and durability. It for my sons large car seat and my daughters booster. The first time we used it we checked it in at the gate, it was big so we used our stroller to tote it around. It went in tied and velcroed and came back the same. The second time we checked it in at the counter because we didn’t have the stroller to cart it around. We received it in exactly the same condition we dropped it off in. It is big but it’s a great way to contain the car seats. We’ll be taking another trip in 3 weeks, I’ll update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Downs

customer_reviews.title: Better than the clear bags from the airlines
customer_reviews.text: A decent enough travel bag to put your car seat in. The material is not the thickest so I can't see it withstanding many flights. The lined bottom is hardly lined at all. Overall though the product serves the purpose of giving you a bag to cover your car seat and carry it with backpack style straps.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, poor fit - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Zippers broke on the first trip. Not well-padded, as claimed. Doesn't fit back in the stuff pouch easily - and definitely not when you're juggling a child, car seat and luggage in an airport! And much too big for most car seats - these were even too big for our stroller. Would not buy this again and do not recommend to other parents. I think we waited too long, but I'd return these if we still had the option. Not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: A must have in the airport!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bag due to the better reviews and price compared to others. We weren't disappointed! Our infant daughter's car seat, base, and stroller attachment (car seat and stroller are two different brands and requires a device to connect the two) all fit comfortably in the bag. The shoulder straps helped a lot in the airport carrying all that stuff! I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: most airlines provide disposable plastic bags but the Bububee bag is far more sturdy, sustainable and easier to open at the end
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this once so far for an international trip with a layover. The bag had plenty of space for the Chicco KeyFit 30 car seat and base and both arrived at my destination without issue. The backpack straps were very practical. For trips originating outside the US, most airlines provide disposable plastic bags but the Bububee bag is far more sturdy, sustainable and easier to open at the end of a long trip.
customer_reviews.author: J&M

customer_reviews.title: 2 yr review
customer_reviews.text: Bag survived 4 flights before one of the shoulder straps got cought on baggage conveyor and was ripped up badly. Prior to this the bag was holding up pretty well with only one small hole. If straps could be inclined and stored inside it would probably last a lot longer. Still have a 2nd one that is good shape after 4 flights
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Easy to Pack
customer_reviews.text: Great travel bag! Our Safety 1st Front Facing car seat fit-with plenty of extra room. I would like to point out that only the bottom of the bag has the neoprene padding. Our seat was still protected, and the bag itself held up great for our multi-stop plane trip. I especially loved that my husband and I could wear it as a backpack and have our hands free for other things (although I did feel like a pack mule going through the airport...lol). It also folds up nice and compact. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LadyLauren

customer_reviews.title: not comfortable, no padding on straps
customer_reviews.text: Returned this .. it fit my car seat just fine (britax frontier) but it was not comfortable or easy to carry. the 'padded straps' that the description mention are a complete joke. They are not padded at all, there's just some extra fabric "pads" , but no padding. Straps are narrow. It hurt my shoulders to carry, and the seat dug into my lower back. Returned and got one of the ones that has wheels and a carry strap and my trip was much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Fits Nuna Pipa with base
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for storing our Nuna Pipa infant car seat between babies. It is very sturdy and fits the seat with base perfectly. We do not plan to travel with the seat in the bag, but it seems like that would work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hart

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t depend on the cheap plastic shoulder strap connectors
customer_reviews.text: So it was plenty big for our car seat but I was a little Leary trying to use the shoulder straps because the shoulder straps on their stroller bag broke INSTANTLY!!! So buyer beware. I’m going to modify the shoulder strap connectors before the next use. This bag did make it thru the airport and did protect our car seat but the fact that I have to modify a brand new backpack car seat carrier makes me not so happy. I just wouldn’t trust the straps The pictures are of our stroller bag shoulder stroller strap connectors
customer_reviews.author: david krasnopolski

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This travel bag is great! We used others that didn't last the trip. This one is very durable. Also VERY easy to use. The straps for the backpack position worked perfectly! We bought two-one for each car seat. Made traveling with two little ones MUCH easier. Great product! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L Borski

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. One of the straps on one of them broke after first use even after gate checking the car seats. The other one held up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: The plastic handle broke the first time that I picked up with the seat inside. I would have returned the product but I had to travel next day. High price, low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great for large convertible carseats!
customer_reviews.text: Used these on a cross country airplane trip for two convertible (grow with me) type toddler carseats. Easy to use, convenient carry handles, very sturdy with padded bottoms to protect the bases. Carseats were in great condition after our trip. Makes it easy and safe to gate check your carseats on long trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amber J.

customer_reviews.title: A MUST-BUY to protect your stroller investment
customer_reviews.text: Love this! While a bit of a pain for my husband to cover our carseat AND the stroller base with the Bububee covers I know that ultimately it will keep my stroller and carseat from being damaged. I watched on multiple legs on how the baggage handlers handled all the gate checked strollers and carseats from the belly of the plane up to the gateway (they are very rough with them), and am so glad I got the covers. Also great when it is raining out and you don't want your items to get wet. Both covers also packed well also in terms of folding back into its own attached pouch.
customer_reviews.author: karin s.

customer_reviews.title: it's not bad at all to carry on your back in the ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I used this on a domestic trip as well as two international trips. When the car seat is properly inserted, it's not bad at all to carry on your back in the bag. Be sure you put it in right or it will bump against your back strangely as you walk and quickly get uncomfortable. The bag held up great, and wasn't damaged (and neither was our car seat) on the trips. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: N. Pappas

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Used this bag to check a large car seat (Graco 4ever All-in-One Car Seat) on multiple international flights. So far, so good. Well constructed. Easily holds this car seat. One can strap to back for the walk from/to the car and/or rental car location, making it relatively easy to transport at the airport. A sensible purchase. Wholeheartedly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: REviewer

customer_reviews.title: I've traveled with this a couple times now and love it. Being able to carry an infant car ...
customer_reviews.text: I've traveled with this a couple times now and love it. Being able to carry an infant car seat on my back while babywearing and dragging a diaper bag is a lifesaver. It's successfully kept the carseat clean, portable, and conveniently folded back into a small bag. I love that I can also use it with the larger carseat when my little guy is older. Sturdy material and construction, comfortable shoulder straps. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: The fact that you caan wear it as a backpack is great! Had it on
customer_reviews.text: Purchased prior to travelling with a 6 week old by myself. The fact that you caan wear it as a backpack is great! Had it on, wore the baby in the carrier on front of me, and rolled our suitcase and carry with the free hands. Stores easily in the bag. Highly recommend for those that like to check their car seat and/or travel alone with the kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! I bought this for my Click Connect car seat, fits with the base and still has a little extra room. I purchased another gate check bag (some red one for the stroller) on Amazon and after 1 trip, that included 10 flights (yes, you read that correctly), the red bag had holes in it. This bag had no damage! Nice, thick material. I would definitely recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria S.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful travel bag
customer_reviews.text: I have had this car seat bag for about 4 years. I used it for an infant seat and now a full forward-facing seat. We use it a couple of times a year when traveling by plane. The backpack-like straps are really helpful. Folds up nicely into the bag (once you get some practice at it). I've had to do a couple of small repairs but one was because I was carrying more weight in it than the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Anderson

customer_reviews.title: We like the built in pouch that it can be rolled ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this recently on a cross country trip. The various straps made it very convenient for us to carry in various ways while juggling multiple bags at the airport. My husband ended up wearing it as an oversized backpack, and it was very manageable. We like the built in pouch that it can be rolled up and stored away in.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend this car seat bag.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the bag worked fine. I liked the closures, and the straps. I had high hoped that this bag would last longer than two flights. We had too much luggage, a toddler, a stroller etc. to gate check the bag however. Note: We only had two flights on this entire vacation, no layovers. The bottom/padded part of the bag, there's a hole the size of a nickel. And it's worn in several other places. In retrospect, I wish I hadn't purchased it. Waste of money. Not recommended for use as checked baggage. My family is making the same trip again soon, and I'm now without a functioning car seat bag.
customer_reviews.author: Joia Obrien

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for protecting and carrying car seat
customer_reviews.text: I needed this bag for a trip we were taking with my grandson. The bag worked beautifully! It made carrying the car seat much easier and kept the car seat clean while stored in the plane. The bag is so nice that even the airline staff commented on what a great bag it was.
customer_reviews.author: Pet Mama

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: The drawstring/Velcro closure isn't the most reliable, as it came open on both bags that we purchased during flight or loading/unloading. Other than that, they have only been used for 2 flights and have held up so far
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag was very durable and easy to carry. The back back straps are a really nice feature, you can hold your child's hand, and wheel suitcase all while carrying your car seat. The bag is large enough to put a few extra items in it too. We were able to fit the car seat, swim stuff (Swimmies, rafts,mask, towel, pump), plus a toy bag and a kid toilet seat and there was still a lot of room. It is nice that car seats are checked luggage that you don't have to pay for. The airlines knew right away by the nice bag, that it was a car seat inside.
customer_reviews.author: tweetydds

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Put our smaller stroller in this. It barely fit & two of the straps broken within 5 minutes. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anya jones

customer_reviews.title: Held Up Great
customer_reviews.text: Being a frequent traveler, I went with this brand as it appeared it would hold up better than other brands. It has done great on its' first 4 flights thus far. I am 5'2" and it fits on my petite frame. I was able to carry not only an infant car seat in it, but also a small duffel bag with baby's clothes in it to save on checked baggage.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kirksey

customer_reviews.title: Less padding but good item
customer_reviews.text: This car seat bag had less padding than expected but it was a good buy and protected our gate checked car seat in flight. As with most items like this, it's harder to stuff into the bag than it claims. Overall it serves it's purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bag held up great on our plane trip! So easy to carry with the backpack straps. Love it! I had the baby strapped to my front in a carrier and the carseat on my back and a diaper bag (carry on) on my shoulder. Worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kneipp

customer_reviews.title: ... makes traveling with a car seat and luggage a easy! Depending on the weight of your car seat
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes traveling with a car seat and luggage a easy! Depending on the weight of your car seat, you may have to put on both straps, but most car seats are light enough that you’ll only need one from your car to the check in.
customer_reviews.author: Romeo83

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality & useful product. Love the straps so you can use as a backpack to free up hands. Keeps car seat clean/ undamaged. Used it twice already and SO glad we got this.
customer_reviews.author: SidP83

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesomeeee!! And you can stuff more items in the car seat with the bag for airline checking. Free car seat checked. No weight limit on South west.
customer_reviews.author: Ls

customer_reviews.title: Great for airline travel
customer_reviews.text: Grandma traveled with car seat in this bag and found it easy to carry. Straps are comfortably placed. Nice large space for writing your name on it. I also put two car booster seats and chjild life vest inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat bag carrier for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This bag was perfect for taking my baby's carseat on the plane. Durable and the shoulder straps allowed me to carry it on my back. It is large enough to fit his carseat base and a large carseat in it too. Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.
customer_reviews.text: We’re pretty happy with it. We’ve taken 2 trips with it and so far it’s held up great.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: tried this and like it so far
customer_reviews.text: i used to use car seat bags w wheels but they always end up ripping or snagging. tried this and like it so far, been on 2 trips w this bag and it still is in great condition w no snags. i also love how it folds up into a bag that's already attached to it so you won't ever lose it.
customer_reviews.author: glaz

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat Travel Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy bag - held both my granddaughters car seats (one Britax car seat and a high back booster) with room to spare. So far the bag also appeared to handle being tossed around by the airlines without tearing. Survived the first roundtrip and appears to be made of a strong fabric. I would recommend this bag, particularly if you want to put other baby items (diapers, etc.) in the bag also.
customer_reviews.author: The Warden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Car Seat Travel
customer_reviews.text: We used this bag on a recent trip to and from LA and Maui. Checked in at gate. The thicker material held up really well and not damaged at all. It also fit and protected our travel Chicco convertible car seat. The backpack feature freed up our hands and made it easier to lug a car seat through the airports. I'm very glad that I spent the extra few dollars to get this one instead of the cheaper, thinner ones.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe's_Mommy

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for our needs! The bag seems to be high quality - we have flown twice with it and no tears or signs of wear. It’s also extremely large and we had no problems putting our car seat in it. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cristy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great gate check bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag was very easy to use. It's very large, so it should fit a variety of car seats. The straps, though thin, seemed comfortable enough on the shoulder when I was trying it out at home before our trip, though I admit I wasn't the one carrying it on travel day, so I can't speak to long(er) term comfort. I'm a big fan of the name label area on the front of the bag as well as the built in storage bag. While only the bottom of this bag is padded, our car seat survived the trip, gate checked, unscathed. I'm very satisfied with this purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: SAS

customer_reviews.title: Definitely happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for us. It's been checked on four flights so far with no tears and no damage to our Peg Perego carseat. Definitely happy with the purchase. Some folks have complained about it being tough to fold back up. It's true that it's not the easiest but if you take a few minutes to do it right, it fits back together perfectly. The carrying case was really compact which I appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Kervin

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy bag! Protected our gate checked car seat on a flight as expected and the colors and name spot made it easy to spot against others.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mills

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These were awesome to fly with. The back pack straps were easy to use. We traveled with 2 kids under 2 and both needed car seat. I would recommend these to anyone flying we a car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Peay

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat bag!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat bag is simply convenient. Our car seat survived a round trip in it. It is very easy to put the car seat in and close the bag. When not in use, it is also straightforward to wrap the bag into the small bag. I do not know what else to say but I am just glad that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Fusheng Shen

customer_reviews.title: You don’t have to struggle with bulky car seats anymore
customer_reviews.text: I love! Love! This Easy to use all you have to do is open it up and place car seat inside! Made traveling much easier especially with how bulky car seats can be! Put it on like a backpack and there you go! I struggled to fold it back together and make it fit into the bag. The only dislike I have is that the storage bag comes attached to it. Besides that it’s a MUST item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag! Held up beautifully for a trip to London & Spain. Car seat was well protected. It was a little hard to get back into the built in bag, but with a second pair of hands it does fit.
customer_reviews.author: jenneritt

customer_reviews.title: Get this one, not the cheap thin ones.
customer_reviews.text: My bag has been used eight times and it is still in great shape. I love the many straps and that it is made with such high quality, durable fabric. The only negative I can think of is that sometimes it is difficult to get it to fit in its stuff sack.
customer_reviews.author: Pixel Artist

customer_reviews.title: Ripped in Three Places :-(
customer_reviews.text: I've flown with this car seat protector only three times and it's ripped in multiple places already. One at the bottom, one in the lining of the zipper area, and the handle ripped off of the storage bag piece. Super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina W.

customer_reviews.title: I had bought one, and it did what it ...
customer_reviews.text: I had bought one, and it did what it needed to which was provide a way for me to carry the cars eat. I bought a second one and for some reason on the first time use the straps broke.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Ripped with first use.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to protect our baby's car seat and are really disappointed. It is not padded at all and on the first flight using it, the entire bottom ripped in half. It wasn't even salvageable for the return trip home.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: The cheep plastic clip that holds the shoulder straps together snapped literally the first time I picked it up. However we used it without the should straps and later fixed it with a carabiner. Bag worked well other than the plastic clip.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Paradise

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Worked as intended. Will never be able to fold it back into the bag though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry as a backpack. It just covers and doesn't really protect since it's not padded. I'm not sure I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: JJO

customer_reviews.title: Held up on first trip. Super useful and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything. Folds small into it's own pouch. Opens nice and wide with double draw string and then has a flap with Velcro to cove the bunched area of the drawstrings. Many handles. Strong. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: i liked the backpack straps
customer_reviews.text: protected and kept my carseat clean while on many flights on our 2-week vacation. i liked the backpack straps. Holds carseat AND base.
customer_reviews.author: mother of six

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: These bags are awesome! They are durable, easy to use and stay closed. Be sure you follow the easy steps so the bag doesn't open. The backpack straps were a lifesaver. I would recommend these to anyone traveling with car seats. Other parents kept stopping us and asking about them.
customer_reviews.author: Dangi12

customer_reviews.title: ... times within a month of buying this bag and love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've flown 4 times within a month of buying this bag and love it!. It is very durable and easy to fold up into the attached carry bag. I love that the carry bag is attached, no need to worry about losing it! The car seat bag is HUGE! My Britax infant seat easy fits into it. The size may seem overwhelming at first but it makes it so easy to get the seat out, even in a rush at the plane door.
customer_reviews.author: tnkrbl10

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to carry and felt very protected
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a multi-stop flight. We had a britax be-safe infant seat in it. It was easy to carry and felt very protected! Thanks! Now we have used it on another multistop flight, it has held up. It can also hold a high back booster plus a hiking backpack in it! I have been very pleased with the ease of use of this product and its durability. It's big enough to fit our very large chiccofit car seat in it too. I also love the backpack straps!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom in OK

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: We opened these at the airport (we bought two) and put a car seat in each. The straps immediately snapped. Don’t buy this if you’re looking to actually use these on trips. Quality is not here.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality stiching, falls apart with first use.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Large and can fit base and car seat, easy to carry...material is flimsy and stitching unraveled on first flight. I expected to get at least 1year of use out of this bag. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Monica N.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used it for first time and had 2 tears in it. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Av-guru

customer_reviews.title: Worked PERFECTLY
customer_reviews.text: Loved these bags. I know they are meant for gate check, but I wrapped my seats in bubble wrap, bagged them with these, and bag checked them. They arrived perfectly. I loved the back pack like straps, which were perfect for carrying through the airport. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product, of good quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product, of good quality, that protect very well. Very convenient, frees both hands when carried as back-pack. Easy to convert into tiny bag, so less space when stored.
customer_reviews.author: Kam Sba

customer_reviews.title: The bag is still good condition. It was a little hard to stuff ...
customer_reviews.text: Made it through gate check on a round trip visit from NYC to LAX with a ChiccoKey Fit 30. There was TONS of room to spare so we threw some diapers and his Inglesina fast table chair. The bag is still good condition. It was a little hard to stuff back into the sack, but it is a nice feature to have nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: jtmom

customer_reviews.title: ... this yet but the quality of the material is great! Thick and seems like it will be durable
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this yet but the quality of the material is great! Thick and seems like it will be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Used this for our nuna car seat
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Used this for our nuna car seat. Folds up easy in travel bag. Kept out car seat clean and in perfect condition for multiple flights.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Have2buy
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I've very happy with my purchase and I will recommend this to all My mom Friends. It made traveling alone with my baby soo much easier
customer_reviews.author: Puglover

customer_reviews.title: No padding, durable material
customer_reviews.text: Won't protect your carseat from being damaged but will keep it from getting dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Dannette

customer_reviews.title: Helpful when traveling!
customer_reviews.text: This was very helpful for traveling with lots of luggage and baby items. It’s a great way to protect the car seat from getting dirty, and you can carry it on your back to be hands-free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, easy to get over the seat - the only thing I wish was a little better was the ease of which you could get it rolled back up into the pouch for storage!
customer_reviews.author: Cori Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: but still difficult to carry if you're short (the straps and length of the seat means it smashes into you in painful ways). Not
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful for lugging that monster carseat for 18 month olds... but still difficult to carry if you're short (the straps and length of the seat means it smashes into you in painful ways). Not really an indictment of the bag, but of lugging such a heavy carseat!
customer_reviews.author: Prof. P

customer_reviews.title: ... and put it all down in this bag and easily gate check it
customer_reviews.text: We were able to click the car seat into the base and put it all down in this bag and easily gate check it. It was a great purchase and held up really well. The backpack straps were really helpful in carrying the car seat from the gate to baggage to the rental car pick up & in the reverse on our way back home. Would recommend to anyone traveling with a car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits my monster car seat like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Fits my monster car seat like a glove. Wouldn't recommend for infant carriers though, too spacious but any other car seat, great!
customer_reviews.author: Arde

customer_reviews.title: It held up great and we had plenty of room for our car ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for our first plane trip with the baby. It held up great and we had plenty of room for our car seat and base. The backpack straps make it easy to carry as well. Would definitely recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The design of this makes it so easy to carry!
customer_reviews.author: D. Cag

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: The zipper likes to act up but overall worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great seat cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seat cover. While they tell you to only gate check with it, we've made 4 domestic trips and 4 overseas trips checking it (with a seat inside) at the counter. It's easy to carry and really a life saver. Packs down to a small size. I'm sure other brands are quite good too - but this one is super durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Beeth23

customer_reviews.title: It’s definitely not comfortable to carry on your back
customer_reviews.text: This bag worked out really well for us. We did not get any tears. Definitely, a quality product. I just wish I opted to get one with wheels since we had so much luggage. It’s definitely not comfortable to carry on your back.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for. We checked the ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. We checked the car seat with our other luggage and how no damage issues. Also- I cared this on my back )while wearing baby in a wrap and pushing a luggage trolley without any issue! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ABSG

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for the first time and after one round trip the product had several holes and wear marks. This isn't a very durable product.
customer_reviews.author: MeredithR

customer_reviews.title: This works very well and was easy to fold and put back into the pouch
customer_reviews.text: This works very well and was easy to fold and put back into the pouch. It's a really big bag and could fit various types of carseats
customer_reviews.author: Miz Duu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our travel needs. Held up well on our Trip from WI to AZ!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my product!!! The quality feels thick and very durable. I really like that it has a place to write your info on the bag in case of it getting lost.
customer_reviews.author: Iryna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product Sturdy, big and survived multiple flights recently. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Val Durant

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised - not too hard to get back ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised - not too hard to get back in case. Has protected our car seat on many flights and has held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: A. LaGasse

customer_reviews.title: Terrific for our car seat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great dad, and I am not impressed easily. It fits our car seat perfectly, and is nicely padded and feels high quality. When we were checking in at the airport a few weeks ago, the airline representative who was pregnant even asked about it because she was like, wow, this one is so much nicer than all the other ones I see. :)
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: No complains..
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. Comfortable to carry and provides good protection to car seat (we also bubble wrapped the car seat before putting it in this bag). No complains! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sumedha D

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Have used it for 4 flights so far to carry our Britax B-Safe Elite and it has held up great. Would definitely buy again or give as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Tx Aggie Mom of 7

customer_reviews.title: Would reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Loved the bag. Protected out car seat on all of the flights. The bag folds up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: b.larson

customer_reviews.title: This bag is big enough!
customer_reviews.text: Fits the KeyFit-30 with the base. Good, tough material and stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Mandie Rock

customer_reviews.title: Rest of it is a good design but really disappointed in the durability
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke after the 2nd use. Rest of it is a good design but really disappointed in the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Alex!

product_meta.title: Car Seat Travel Bag System for Airline Gate Check (One Size Fits Most) Extra Strength with Carrying Pouch & Padded Base Protection by Bububee
feature_bullets: Best in class! We made improvements to our original 4.6/5 star rated car seat bag based on customer feedback to bring you this best-in-class car seat bag for gate check! FITS MOST CAR SEATS: Designed by a former airline employee & mother of three, the Bububee Elua Car Seat Bag is tear & water resistant with a generous sizing that fits most car seats.

SUPERIOR PROTECTION: Made of high density tear & water resistant Oxford nylon, the base of our bag is fully lined with a neoprene fabric to help protect the base of your car seat against water, dirt, and grime.
EASIER TO CARRY: With 2 padded back pack style straps, 2 side carry straps, and 1 front hand strap, we make transporting your car seat easier!

4-STEP SECURE CLOSURE SYSTEM: Bububee's 4-step closure system prevents our bags from opening while being handled. Step (1) Cinch the drawstrings from both ends, Step (2) Lock both ends, Step (3) Tie the ends of the drawstring into a bow, Step (4) Cover the opening with the velcro flap.
PORTABLE & STYLISH: Neatly folds into a carrying pouch that is attached to the inside of the bag. It's so good looking, you forget that it's a car seat bag!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars269 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
